author: cbegin
msg: TypeHandlerFactory and DataExchangeFactory are no longer Singletons.  There is a separate instance of each for each instance of SqlMapExecutorDelegate.  This change was necessary to facilitate custom type handlers within the scope of an SqlMapClient instance.

msg: Docs for new custom type handler classes.
